<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Necrotic Infusion](/Feats.aspx?ID=280) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Metamagic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=107" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 123 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[harmful font](/Classes.aspx?ID=5); evil alignment

</column>

---

You pour negative energy into your undead subject to empower its attacks. If the next action you use is to cast [_harm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) to restore Hit Points to a single undead creature, the target then deals an additional 1d6 negative damage with its melee weapons and unarmed attacks until the end of its next turn. If the _harm_ spell is at least 5th level, this damage increases to 2d6, and if the _harm_ spell is at least 8th level, the damage increases to 3d6.
name: Necrotic Infusion
